|t:|1698976886

|turn|25
|c|☆ShwyGuy|oh geez
|c|☆ShwyGuy|that sucks
|c|☆ShwyGuy|I took off CC from this at the last minute like a fool
|c|☆Durandral|i hit cancel to check on my wish count but i clicked garganacl again
|c|☆Durandral|does the game just not register the change at that point?
|c| kayjulers|Sometimes Showdown eats more recent inputs due to internet connection or something. It's happened to me in ladder matches. That sucks
|c|☆ShwyGuy|I have no idea
|c|☆Durandral|oh that would make sense. feels bad man
|j| Bogaes
|c|☆ShwyGuy|definitely switching there wouldve been tough for me
|c|☆Durandral|oh well it was a good one
|c|☆ShwyGuy|for sure
|c|☆Durandral|yeah i thought you had no out and we were just going to play chicken with switching until you die to stealth rock
|c| Bogaes|Yeah, Shwy must have selected a move before you hit cancel
|c| kayjulers|Tera grass on his wake
